abstract: Requests that external entities are never loaded.
overview:
## Discussion

You may choose only one of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesAlways], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesSameOriginOnly], or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesNever] or none.

Requests that external entities are never loaded. You may choose only one of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesAlways], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesSameOriginOnly], or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesNever] or none.

Choosing none results in the system-default behavior. For applications linked on OS X v10.6 and earlier, this is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesAlways]. For applications linked on macOS 10.7 or later, all entities that don’t require network access are loaded.

# nodeLoadExternalEntitiesNever

**Type Property**

Requests that external entities are never loaded.

## Declaration

```swift
static var nodeLoadExternalEntitiesNever: XMLNode.Options { get }
```

## Discussion

You may choose only one of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesAlways], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesSameOriginOnly], or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesNever] or none.

Requests that external entities are never loaded. You may choose only one of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesAlways], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesSameOriginOnly], or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesNever] or none.

Choosing none results in the system-default behavior. For applications linked on OS X v10.6 and earlier, this is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeLoadExternalEntitiesAlways]. For applications linked on macOS 10.7 or later, all entities that don’t require network access are loaded.

## Constants

- **documentIncludeContentTypeDeclaration**: Includes a content type declaration for HTML or XHTML in the output of the document.
- **documentTidyHTML**: Formats HTML into valid XHTML during processing of the document.
- **documentTidyXML**: Changes malformed XML into valid XML during processing of the document.
- **documentValidate**: Validates this document against its DTD (internal or external) or XML Schema.
- **documentXInclude**: Replaces all XInclude nodes in the document with the nodes referred to.
- **nodeCompactEmptyElement**: Requests that an element should be contracted when empty; for example, `<flag/>`.
- **nodeExpandEmptyElement**: Requests that an element should be expanded when empty; for example, `<flag></flag>`. This is the default.
- **nodeIsCDATA**: Specifies that a text node contains and is written out as a CDATA section.
- **nodeLoadExternalEntitiesAlways**: Requests that external entities are always loaded.
- **nodeLoadExternalEntitiesSameOriginOnly**: Requests that external entities are always loaded and only applies when a URL has been provided.
- **nodeNeverEscapeContents**
- **nodePreserveAll**
- **nodePreserveAttributeOrder**: Requests that NSXMLNode preserve the order of attributes as in the source XML.
- **nodePreserveCDATA**: Requests that NSXMLNode preserve CDATA blocks where defined in the input XML.
- **nodePreserveCharacterReferences**: Specifies that character references (`&#`*nnn*`;`) should not be resolved for XML output of this node.
